Package main

Class OrderCoffeeController

java.lang.Object
main.OrderCoffeeController
public class OrderCoffeeController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller for the GUI that allows the user to order coffee.
Author:
Alexander Xie, Michael Nguyen

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, MainMenuController mainMenuData)
      Sets up the sizeComboBox options and selects the first item. Changes subtotalTextField to reflect the selected coffee size.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - PrimaryStage
      mainMenuData - MainMenuController

    • backToMainMenu

      public void backToMainMenu()
      Closes the stage that allows for ordering coffee.

    • addToOrder

      public void addToOrder()
      Adds the coffee to the order and resets the stage to default values.

    • getSubtotal

      public float getSubtotal()
      Gets the subtotal obtained from the coffee values selected.
      Returns:
      The subtotal of the coffee as a float.

    • changeSubtotalTextField

      public void changeSubtotalTextField()
      Changes subtotalTextField's text to the subtotal calculated by getSubtotal
